full_summary:
### Rideau Canal Skateway – First Aid Services

#### Job Description
The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking bid proposals for first aid services for the operation and maintenance of the Rideau Canal Skateway. The successful bid will be responsible for providing first aid services for the duration of the contract, which is expected to commence on October 1st, 2023, and end on May 31st, 2028.

#### Key Terms
* Contract Term: 5 years
* Services Required: First Aid Services
* Location: Rideau Canal Skateway, Ottawa, ON
* Contact Person: Alyssa Brook, Senior Contract Officer
* Contact Email: alyssa.brook@ncc-ccn.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 571-8453

#### Bid Details
* Bid Deadline: September 5th, 2023, by 3:00 p.m. EDT
* Bid Submission Method: Email
* Bid Submission Email: Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca
* Bid Reference: #AB002
* Tender File: Available on the Canada Buys website
* Note: The bid email has a maximum capacity of 30MB. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.

#### Selection Criteria
* Offers must comply with all requirements of the contract to be considered responsive.
* The responsive offer with the lowest total evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Important Notes
* The NCC will endeavour to provide responses to inquiries in the form of addenda.
* Addenda will be posted on the Canada Buys website.
* Interested proponents must not contact any other employee of the NCC or other persons involved in this solicitation to discuss questions regarding the contract process.

#### Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)  There are no attachments to post as the text is quite long. Let
